div.p: Eirmod sed ipsum dolor sit rebum labore magna erat. Tempor ut dolore lorem kasd vero ipsum sit eirmod sit diam justo sed rebum.

input.name: csrf_token
input.t-nocache: The csrf token must always be up to date.

span.class: d-block fa fa-4x fa-thumbs-up mx-auto rounded-circle bg-primary

h5.span: you have registered as a Bid Property, check your email for further details. successfully

div.p: We will get back to you shortly.
